column4: I get error message "error while loading shared libraries: libphonon.so.4: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory" while i try to launch an application. Locate libphonon.so.4 gives me "/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libphonon.so.4" and "/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libphonon.so.4.6.0"
Why application cannot open shared object file?
Sounds like the /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu directory is not in the library search path
ok, what should i do about it? remove it?
